name: Among Us School Map
description:
This is a submission for the Unofficial Among Us Fan Game Jam. This is an Among us school map, there is a cafeteria and gym (the door in the gym doesn't work), but I will add a classroom eventually. There is no imposters or online play, all you can do is school themed tasks. Here is a run-down of all the tasks and how to do them:

  • Cleaning Food: Tap all the foods
  • Recycle: Put the trash in the trashcan, and the recycling in the recycling bin
  • Basketball: Click the basketball
  • Weights: Drag the weight to the hand (yes, that's a hand)

Sounds and some images by Innersloth and Scratch (font by Google Drawings), I made this game in scratch and converted it to HTML using this: https://sheeptester.github.io/htmlifier/
